title: Humor and Persuasion
description: A quick win: understand Humor and Persuasion.

hook.text: The funniest Super Bowl ads are the most remembered â€” and they sell the most product.

buildup.text: Humor works because laughter releases endorphins and creates positive associations with the source.

discovery.text: Research shows humor increases liking, and we're more easily persuaded by people we like.

twist.text: But humor that overshadows the message fails â€” people remember the joke, not the product.

climax.text: The best persuasive humor ties the joke to the message. The laugh and the lesson become inseparable.

punchline.text: Make them laugh and they'll lower their guard.

quiz.question: Why does humor increase persuasion?
options: Laughter creates positive associations with the source
